characters.name: Dragon
characters.bio: You lead with courage and never back down from big goals.

characters.name: Unicorn
characters.bio: You are kind and calm, bringing warmth wherever you go.

characters.name: Phoenix
characters.bio: You rise strongly after setbacks and keep your ambition alive.

characters.name: Griffin
characters.bio: You protect your friends and think before action.

characters.name: Mermaid
characters.bio: You sense feelings deeply and connect people with kindness.

characters.name: Centaur
characters.bio: You blend bravery and determination with practical wisdom.

characters.name: Minotaur
characters.bio: You are strong, loyal, and reliable under pressure.

characters.name: Sphinx
characters.bio: You use clever questions and calm logic to uncover truths.

characters.name: Fairy
characters.bio: You make difficult days feel lighter with kindness and joy.

characters.name: Kraken
characters.bio: You are calm, observant, and ready when your courage is needed.
